title: 113_hr1202
content: One Percent Spending Reduction Act of 2013 - Amends the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 to establish the aggregate projected outlay for FY2014 at the FY2013 outlay cap , less 1. Reduces each outlay cap for FY2015-FY2018 by 1 of the previous fiscal year's outlay cap . Requires the outlay cap for FY2019 and each subsequent fiscal year to be 18 of the CBO-estimated gross domestic product (GDP) for that calendar year. Amends the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 to make it out of order in both chambers to consider any bill, joint resolution, amendment, or conference report that includes any provision that would cause the most recently reported, current outlay cap to be exceeded. Prescribes procedures for waiver or suspension of this rule.
